# Plastic Sheet Production
Plastic sheets are versatile synthetic materials used in a wide variety of recipes. While not inherently complex to produce, they require high temperatures and multiple reagents to synthesize correctly.
## Recipe
To produce [bold]10 Plastic Sheets[/bold], combine the following in a chemical mixer and heat to at least [bold]374 Kelvin[/bold]:
— 10 units of [bold]Oil[/bold]
— 6 units of [bold]Ash[/bold]
— 4 units of [bold]Sulfuric Acid[/bold]

## Output
Once complete, Plastic will appear on top of the beaker or ChemMaster. Transfer it to storage or fabrication systems as needed.
